website_summaries.verdict: A beef collagen paleo protein powder that is sourced from hormone- and antibiotic-free and grass-fed cattle.
pros: Delivers the full amino acid profile to support joint and gut health
Does not contain dairy products, gluten, artificial colors, artificial flavors, binding agents, preservatives, and flow agents
Fudge brownie flavor leaves a pleasant aftertaste
cons: Contains stevia, which gives the powder a very sweet flavor

customer_reviews.title: Why the bigger scoop?!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the manufacturer would answer the question about the change in scoop sizes. My old vanilla had a 53cc scoop while the new package has a 80cc scoop and the chocolate flavor is a 60cc scoop. This is an expensive product and I don't want to use more than I need. There is no change is serving size or weight or number of servings in the package or the package overall weight so I don't understand the scoop that's 50% bigger. Other than that, I like this protein powder overall. It's a bit too stevia sweet for my taste, but I haven't been able to find an alternative that's as high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Gotow

customer_reviews.title: Too much stevia, but a great product
customer_reviews.text: To my tastebuds, this has too much stevia flavor. I don't recommend drinking this with water; it will taste much better if you blend it with some other base, and possibly some fruit. One star off for taste, 5 stars for product pureness and quality. Also, I never received a scoop with this. I sent an e-mail to the manufacturer and got a prompt response and offer to mail me one. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: heyrey

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this by the one and only Emily Schromm during her challenge I took. I'm a firm believer that you get what you pay for when it comes to supplements. My search for protein powder is over, this is the one! The vanilla is the flavor I order and it's soooo good! The only reason I'm docking a star is for the crappy seals on the packaging. I'm now onto my second bag and cannot get the seals to stay closed. I have to use a chip clip and pray to the protein gods that it doesn't come undone while traveling. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE address this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Senway

customer_reviews.title: Not the best tasting but ya know
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this after reading the reviews. Pros: Clean, little ingredients, chocolate who doesn’t like chocolate. I didn’t find that it was overly sweet and I’ve cut out all sugar but for some I could see it being a problem. Keeps you full due to high content of protein especially pre and post workout. Cons: Taste isn’t the best def doesn’t taste like a chocolate milkshake. As described on the package not all of it will mix well. Wish the scoop wasn’t packed inside the bag should be taped to the outside of bag for easier retrieval.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Funny/Doesn't Mix
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this instead of the other beef protein I use and I really regret that. It smells pretty foul (like cattle) and has a very beefy aftertaste. The consistency is what really put me off though. It doesn't blend. I usually make a recipe with the beef protein powder I usually use. When I used this protein powder instead, it totally ruined my recipe and I had to throw it away. I had purchased this protein powder in the past and didn't have the issue with the off-putting smell and taste. I think they changed their formula or something. I am very upset because this protein powder was not cheap. Two stars because I like the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, BUT the packaging is AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product, and the flavor is fine (not great, but fine - has a bit of the "artificial" sweetener taste). The packaging, however, is HORRIBLE!!!! The "resealable" package would not reseal - shoot, it arrived unsealed and didn't even seal ONCE. As a result, I had to find a different container to put the product in, and of course it didn't want to poor easily, so I lost some in the transition to the new container. That also meant that I had the product in a different container with no labelling information (which I really need, since I have several powders in my cabinet). The product is fine (4 stars) - the packaging is a 1.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile 13

customer_reviews.title: Too much stevia.
customer_reviews.text: Just as so many reviews state, there is way too strong a stevia flavor and after taste. I like most everything but it took adding 1/2 grapefruit, power greens, maca powder and turmeric to subdue the flavor a bit. But then any time I burp in the day, I can still taste it. Will not be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Happywife

customer_reviews.title: This batch seemed to be bad, with way too much Stevia , what changed?
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this before and really liked it but something changed and this batch had way too much Stevia and tasted terrible. I had switched it into another container so I don't think I can return it either. Too bad because I liked it before and the price was good. : ( Update: I sent message to the company and they refunded me so an extra star for good customer service, hope they taste test their batches and fix the Stevia overload!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good clean protein
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this protein for about 1.5 years. I absolutely love this protein. Favorite flavor is chocolate. It's only 3 ingredients, gluten and dairy free. No artificial flavors. I use it in my shakes every day. I add frozen strawberries, blueberries kale half of an avocado and a little water with one scoop of protein. I make it very thick and it tastes amazing. I highly recommend this protein.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: This product tastes amazing and mixes beautifully in my blender to make delicious ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bariatric patient and protein shakes that are made of the highest quality ingredients and free from nasty artificial sweeteners are non negotiable to me. This product tastes amazing and mixes beautifully in my blender to make delicious smoothies/protein shakes. Do NOT let the words "beef protein powder" scare you, there isn't a hint of a beef flavor in there! I highly recommend incorporating this into your bariatric lifestyle and cannot say enough about this company and their commitment to bring a protein powder that is not full of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Newlon

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Shake I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: After tons of research, I chose this protein shake because of the simple natural ingredients and the pretty freaking amazing macros. I had been warned from friends that beef protein shakes were disgusting. O-M-G. I mixed this with two cups of unsweetened almond milk in my Ninja for about two minutes. Hands down, 5 stars amazing. Frothy, chocolatey, smooth- almost makes me forget that it’s not a fattening milkshake! It’s pricey, but I promise you it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: I got the chocolate flavor. I used an electric shake mixer with 8-12 oz of unsweetened almond milk and 1 full scoop. It tastes great. Had a nice smoothie type consistency and not over sweet for me like other reviews I have read. I love it and I am so happy that it only has 3 ingredients versus the many other brands that have multiple crazy things in them that I have to look up to make sure it is not affecting my blood sugar. I am about to buy the vanilla!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute if you have digestive problems.
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with digestive problems...SIBO, gluten and dairy intolerance, which cause significant discomfort when I consume foods that are sugary, high in fiber, and that contain lactose. I've been using this product for about three months now without any symptoms. I use it as a meal replacement in the mornings and for recovery after workouts. The taste and texture are pretty good. I would recommend this product, especially if you have digestive problems as well.
customer_reviews.author: RoW

customer_reviews.title: Borderline undrinkable
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst tasting protein I've ever tried and I've tried a lot of different brands over the years. I know it's not just due to the fact that it's a beef based protein powder because I loved the chocolate flavored beef protein from Julian Bakery, but unfortunately it seems like they are no longer making it, which is what led me to try this product. This is likely going in the garbage, which is really unfortunate due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Horrific after taste
customer_reviews.text: I can not explain how awful the after taste is. I’ve had a bunch of different types of protein shakes and this brand was nasty. Is smelled great and the initial taste is great but once I swallowed it there was an almost rancid after taste. I tried it with milk and another time with water. I also tried it again with some pb fit added to it. Can not stomach it.
customer_reviews.author: Bethyviz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, heavy on stevia, packaging needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Pros: love that this is a clean ingredient protein powder that’s allergen friendly. Overall high quality and blends in nicely. Cons: It’s definitely too sweet/heavy on the stevia, the packaging never reseals so plan to have another container to move this into. Also not really a con, but always blend on low or it will get really foamy. I usually just blend my smoothie first, then add it in at the end and give it a light blend on a low level.
customer_reviews.author: SunDevil

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate - SO GOOD. Vanilla - PASS.
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate protein is AMAZING. The most chocolatey-fudgey tasting protein I’ve ever tasted. I do not know how they got it so wrong with vanilla. I was mixing chocolate protein with coffee and it tasted like the best mocha you’ve ever had. Tried to do the same with vanilla... NOPE. Even plain, not great. Vanilla also seems to blend worse than chocolate, both have some issues with blending fully in a blender bottle (which they mention on the bag). Blending with a handheld milk frother works the best, for sure. ZERO stomach issues with either. Great product! Work on vanilla flavouring please!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Frontain

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: Gross after flavor. It blends well and I like the simple ingredients, but the product gave my shake a weird after flavor, chemical and bitter. I then mixed it with just water to taste just the powder, it has a very bitter flavor and a bad after taste that stays in the tongue.
customer_reviews.author: David Tarlow

customer_reviews.title: Easy blend, good taste, great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protein mix. It blends really well and has a good flavor. It has minimal ingredients that are all good, so I feel good drinking it. It has a bit of a funky odor, but I think that's just the beef protein smell.
customer_reviews.author: narism

customer_reviews.title: Foul smelling powder and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to make a vanilla cake smoothie with this, but upon opening the bag, it smelled awful and made me gag. I don't know if it is the stevia but I made one drink with it and was unable to drink it due to the awful, foul smell. I should have listened to the reviews. Don't waste your money. I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: T.G.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this protein powder for about 6 months now and I’m in love with this product. It appears to be very clean and I actually feel pretty full after having this in the morning. I highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a quality source for some good protein.
customer_reviews.author: Nik J.

customer_reviews.title: New formula?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this product for months and have really been enjoying it but it seems like they recently changed the formula. The last package I got tasted a lot like beef broth without enough chocolate and it’s pretty gross. I don’t know if I’ll be ordering again. It used to taste really good so I hope this is just a bad batch! Also, I agree about the bad packaging. The bag is impossible to reseal and spills powder everywhere, which for the price is not ok!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Bloat, indigestion
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes but unfortunately it didn’t work for me. The taste is fine but this gave me the WORST indigestion and bloated stomach. Unparalleled, just horrible. Beyond anything I’ve ever gotten from whey.
customer_reviews.author: eleanor bradley

customer_reviews.title: Too strong of a stevia taste for me.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because looking I was looking for a whey free protein powder. Though I use it because of the high protein count, I am not a fan of the strong stevia taste. I was also not able to reseal my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Finally, finally, finally I found a protein powder ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally, finally, finally I found a protein powder that has everything in it that I want. And, more importantly, it doesn't have the ingredients I don't want to put in my body! Thank you, and I definitely will buy this product again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaguar Woman

customer_reviews.title: Barnyard Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this product is supposed to taste like a barnyard? Literally tastes like you would think a cow hoof would taste. Musky and muddy.... anyone else experiencing this???
customer_reviews.author: DMac

customer_reviews.title: Did they change the formula?
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product many times. Amazon says 9 times. I enjoy it and it is tasty. However, this past time it has been very clumpy and gross. I drink and get clumps of powder in my shake. I am not certain where they went wrong with the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Miller-lococo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Except for the Stevia
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and I recommend it. I'm thrilled to have an alternative to pea protein based powders. My only wish, like many other reviewers, is that it be way, way less sweetened. I tend to add a pitted date or a dash of maple syrup to my protein drinks, so a lot of stevia is overkill (I'm not a stevia fan anyway).
customer_reviews.author: ljg23

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like bone broth
customer_reviews.text: I would like my money back for this product! It was so misleading! The vanilla one literally smells delicious like cake and as soon as you taste it it’s horrific, literally taste like bone broth. I’m sorry but I don’t like the taste of bone broth with my smoothies. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!!! Than you Dr. Gustin :-)
customer_reviews.text: I love this prime protein. It tastes delicious and helps me get in my protein for the day. So glad I found it. Dr. Gustin has gone above and beyond to make super clean and good for you products. I've been Keto for almost a year and once I tried his Perfect Keto MCT powder oil I never looked back. Equip and Perfect Keto products are my go to's everyday. Thank you for such amazing products. I turn all my Keto friends onto these products.
customer_reviews.author: gloriapiz55

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE NOTE THIS REVIEW IS ONLY FOR CHOCOLATE FLAVOR NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE NOTE THIS REVIEW IS ONLY FOR CHOCOLATE FLAVOR NOT VANILLA. The chocolate beef protein is unable to mix and sits on top of the liquid despite using several different shaker cups. I realize that without binders and stablizers it will be more clumpy, but have never had this issue with the vanilla powder. It is unpalatable without use of a blender. For the price paid I expected a much higher quality. I have never had this issue with the vanilla and will continue to purchase this product. The vanilla has none of the above issues and is one of the only non-dairy protein powders I have no digestion issues with or sensitivity to.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hoerman

customer_reviews.title: Gross and does not mix well
customer_reviews.text: Does not mix well and the taste is horrible. I will not buy this again, im forcing my way through this bag bc I paid so much for it but it’s the worst tasting/mixing protein I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting  Vanilla Beef Protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 99% of the beef protein powders and some are disgusting, some are ok, but this one is now my go to. Very good. I make a P'nut butter/protein sludge and it is very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Yo-Vin

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: Very, very stevia sweet. Have tried it once and found it totally undrinkable, left a sticky film in my mouth. Super disappointed. I have Crohn's and need an easily assimilated protein. My high hopes were dashed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good source of protein
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my functional medicine coach to increase my daily intake of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Paleo protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent clean Paleo compliant protein powder. Just enough sweetness from Stevia leaf. I have mixed it with water and found that to be OK. I have also whipped it into whole fat yogurt and that has been good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder out there- SUPER delicious
customer_reviews.text: Best protein powder out there- SUPER delicious, amazingly clean ingredients, great on its own or in a smoothy. (only downside is it doesn't bake well like whey based powders, but it is my protein of choice because of the ingredients and deliciousness)
customer_reviews.author: K. Friend (The Romantic Rush)

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and filling
customer_reviews.text: I'll update later on further details. So far seems to taste decent at the least. Comes with a scoop to measure. I put it in with fruit and other ingredients to craft a shake.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Better than high quality whey isolate.
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it avoid the normal gut attacks that milk based proteins can bring, the overall sense of well being that comes from taking this is far superior to any high end, grass fed whey isolates I have tried. Flavor is good, it’s strongly sweetened with stevia but you have to remember this stuff is made from beef. Highly recommend for anyone who is serious about nutrition and doesn’t want to consume junk protein or is sensitive to lactose.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Source & the Fluffiest Smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this product (reordered as soon as I ran out) and I love it! I am dairy free so I typically buy vegan proteins but I felt like this may be a better source of protein. I’m not a huge fan of how it mixes with liquids but I love using it for smoothies! It’s creates a super fluffy, smooth texture and I think it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste. Clumpy.
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to clean when just mixed with water/milk because it tends to clump. I prefer it mixed with ice in a shaker bottle. Blending it makes it too frothy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Paul Gustkey

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great taste
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily protein shake. It’s clean, not a lot of added junk like many protein powders. It takes great. I have this for breakfast every morning and actually crave it! Super easy to travel with as well. I spend 50% of my time traveling for work and portion out servings to take with me. I love this in unsweetened almond milk!
customer_reviews.author: Ultra Honeybee

customer_reviews.title: The vanilla doesn't mix well!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the chocolate with no issues and thought I'd give the vanilla a try. It doesnt mix at all! The powder just sit on the top of the water in clumps, it's so gross. I've even thought maybe I'd try it in protein pancakes or protein mugcake instead, that doesnt even work! Not sure if I have a bad batch or what...I'll never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder I’ve had!
customer_reviews.text: No whey, fillers, additives etc and love the brownie flavor! Great for my Keto!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Cranford

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the chocolate flavor for a couple years and LOVE it. blends well in a shaker bottle, not sickly sweet, and really like that it’s a clean protein. Unfortunately there’s only vanilla available and it just doesn’t hold up to the chocolate. Doesn’t blend as well and tastes too much like stevia. Still like that it’s a clean protein though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sramek

customer_reviews.title: Super product!!
customer_reviews.text: It's always a risk to try new protein powder--either it's chalky tasting, or too sweet, or.... any number of things that are undesirable. I was looking for a grass-fed beef bone broth powder and found this one with only four ingredients! The quality is great, the taste is good, no unappealing extra flavors or ingredients I am trying to avoid. The price is great for what you get, so I'll definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying this protein. I love how it stays thick, blends well in my vitamix and gets a small amount of foam on the top. I think it would be excellent blended into coffee. Given that it's non-dairy and doesn't have added gums, this will be my go-to protein. Very glad I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Simple ingredients - clean
customer_reviews.text: Use this product in my daily smoothie. I like the flavor but it is the simple ingredients that are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it for me.
customer_reviews.text: Really good stuff. Easy to digest and it satiates me whereas an hour after a whey protein (even good organic/grass fed) I would be hungry again. I take it with their dehydrated sweet potato mix for clean carbs post workout.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dairy Free protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Blends great in a smoothie. Love the ingredients. Being dairy free it’s been hard to find a protein powder I like. This one hits it out of the park, especially with no nasty sweetener aftertaste!
customer_reviews.author: @planty_melmel

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after a long research. I’m anemic and not a meat lover so I needed something to substitute the red meat in my diet and boost my hemoglobin. I usually feel tired by midday but I noticed that if I drink the protein in the morning, it boosts my energy and I can get more things done throughout the day. I recommend the product. It does the job for me and it takes like cocoa
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya Shilev

customer_reviews.title: Good  Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: Good quality protein powder. My only complaint is to much of the stevia taste for me. The chocolate is less sweet than the vanilla though.
customer_reviews.author: outdoor lover

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: This tastes terrible. Way too sweet and too much of a stevia taste. I blended it with fruit and greens and could not finish the smoothie. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Ruined by too much stevia...
customer_reviews.text: This product is ruined by the massive amount of stevia added. I’ve tried adding peanut butter, espresso, berries, greens, etc. Nothing masks the cloying, bitter too-sweet stevia taste. I love the clean ingredients, but won’t be buying this again until they fix the recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Reaume

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I needed a extra boost of Protien in my smoothies woithout adding much fat. This product delivers that and a great chocolate taste too! It has a fine texture so it blends extremely easy. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tetem57

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is not stellar but it’s ok
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was not as pleasing as the protein powder I have eaten for a long time. I’ll keep trying to get used to the flavor. Don’t know about the blending power , cause I eat it sprinkled on fruit and yogurt for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: My son who is very picky about eating meat has loved this shake every morning. I feel so good giving it to him with the very simple ingredients used! I mix it with raw milk and raw milk vanilla yogurt for an extra punch of protein, fat and probiotics!
customer_reviews.author: NJenkins

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. Taste is very good and not too sweet. This is an upgrade from cheap-ass whey protein. Are you man enough?
customer_reviews.author: Dark Fantasy Fan

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes amazing! A little hard to blend with just almond milk and a blender bottle, but the taste and ingredients more than make up for it. The little chunks that don’t blend do not taste powdery. Not a big issue at all! Just an observation. I don’t think I’ll ever use another protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Faulknor

customer_reviews.title: Good product source
customer_reviews.text: I tried blending with cold and hot liquid with a swisk and shaker. But I would rather have natural products than artificial ingredients that would make blending better. 15years RNY using a multitude of protein supplements, this one was still a winner for product source and flavor. Go keto
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to digest
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely delicious. There is no unpleasant after-taste. It is easy to digest. The absolute best protein product I have purchased in 30 years
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mangieri & Claire Mangieri

customer_reviews.title: This is messing with my stomach pretty good still
customer_reviews.text: This is messing with my stomach pretty good still. I've taken it for 4 days now and have had pretty bad gas and diarrhea. Hoping I get use to it and stop pooping so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Best paleo (and overall) protein powder out there, hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So chocolate-y!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best protein powders I've tried! I love that it's limited to three ingredients, tastes amazing, blends super well, and digests easily. This is my go-to protein powder for sure! Use it as a shake with almond milk, in smoothies, in oatmeal, mixed into yogurt - the best flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great, clean beef protein with delicious vanilla flavor! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Would like a little less sweet but tastes good in my breakfast fruit smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on stomach and super clean!
customer_reviews.text: This protein is very gentle on your stomach and tastes really delicious. Stop going to GNC to buy proteinthat has mostly filler and start your gains with this product. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DYnasty

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Terrible and Bag Seal Broken
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product! I like sweet flavors but this was WAY too sweet. Also, the seal on my bag would not close after I opened it. This is a must for protein powder. Overall, I am very disappointed in this product. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein powder. I follow a Paleo diet but, I can't have chicken or eggs. So, with Equip, I'm able to get my protein in without having stomach issues. Other protein powders have too much added "stuff" but, this doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: L. King

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto-Collagen Powder
customer_reviews.text: I finally found my go to Keto-collagen protein powder. I was looking for one that has a decent amount of protein and collagen. The chocolate flavor is so good, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rauf Rabbani

customer_reviews.title: Such a great protein! I love that this protein has such ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a great protein! I love that this protein has such limited ingredients. It also doesn’t use whey so if you are trying to be dairy free this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marilu

customer_reviews.title: Cleanest meanest protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this protein! I use this as a post workout recovery and believe me when I say that during my workouts, 9 times out of 10 knowing that I get this shake after motivates me to finish strong! I'm also motivated to workout in the first place, knowing that I get this after. It is so delicious. I usually mix with coconut water to get some post workout carbs in as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy a Shake
customer_reviews.text: We ordered both the vanilla and chocolate. Makes really good shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Thebayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with a scoop.
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein powder I have tried. It mixes fairly well but can be a challenging. It also doesn't come with a scoop so I have to measure out a serving size every time with my scale and that is a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Sooo good
customer_reviews.text: Very good protein powder with great flavor! Don't be afraid to purchase this, it DOES NOT taste like beef in anyway. I have always put it in my Vitamix and blended it up with almond milk, spinach, a small amount of fruit and collagen. It's always been thick and filling. I have always been impressed with Dr. Anthony's products. Good quality and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Newlon

customer_reviews.title: Flavor has changed
customer_reviews.text: My last couple of purchases of Prime protein have had a bad flavor. I have been a big fan of this protein powder for the last 18 months but something has changed and it tastes terrible to me!
customer_reviews.author: Bear Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly good!!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is really good. I use my nutra bullet and add cashew milk with ice and it is absolutely great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: formula changed
customer_reviews.text: They must have changed something in the mix. the flavor tastes and smells more like meat than earlier formulations. I am disappointed and looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Fly fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The product mixes well and keeps me from getting super hungry. I do wish the artificial sweeter was toned done.
customer_reviews.author: azkrystl

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, so tasty, not even a hint of beef isolate, I don't know how they do it. Very flavorful vanilla taste, yum!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Nasty tasting
customer_reviews.text: NASTY tasting and doesn’t mix well. Total waste of money! :(
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and clean ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious flavor, clean ingredients, and mixes easily. Doctor recommend, no whey. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TCF

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great flavor.
customer_reviews.text: This has great flavor and with only 3 ingredients I feel good about using this when I'm on the go as a protein source. It's really hard to find clean supplements made from real food.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney S.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protein powder. I had a bit of a hang up with it being beef protein (I was picturing a steak smoothie), however this doesn't taste bad (or meaty) at all. It took me a couple of days to get used to the stevia taste, but now I'm good to go. I like that there are only a few ingredients and I don't get an upset stomach from it either. I highly recommend this and the Purewod Build.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glynn

customer_reviews.title: Both flavors
customer_reviews.text: Vanilla is delicious and tastes like a French vanilla creamer. Wouldn't mix it juice cause the vanilla is strong flavored. Chocolate good too, but vanilla sets the tone.
customer_reviews.author: Teo

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I love sweet things, but this is a bit too much.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: This beef protein tastes considerably better than the pea protein I had been using
customer_reviews.text: I had been using vanilla flavored pea protein but switched to this. This beef protein tastes considerably better than the pea protein I had been using. Threw in some greens, fruit, a few almonds and I had a very tasty shake. I'd recommend this protein to anyone who wants to include protein shakes in their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Tone & Associates LLC

customer_reviews.title: My new go to protein shake
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, easy to digest unlike whey protein (for me). A little difficult to blend but just takes a couple of extra shakes and it's good, very smooth and easy to drink. The reclosable package doesn't work that good but I use a chip clip and it stays fresh
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: So Happy to have found this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: So Happy to have found this protein powder!! Nothing synthetic, artificial, or binders. Just clean, good tasting 100 calories, 24 grams of protein, with only 1 carb. Finally! Will gladly add this to my subscription order!
customer_reviews.author: Katieb868

customer_reviews.title: The taste is awful...dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten beef protein powders before and this tastes terrible. I've read that it's the stevia. Whatever it is I won't be buying it again and regret buying it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The protein powder is great overall. My one complaint would be the packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: The protein powder is great overall. My one complaint would be the packaging which will not reseal after opening. If I'm going to pay $64 for protein powder I want to make sure the package it comes in will keep my product fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: yucky.
customer_reviews.text: gross. literally gagged when I tried it. on the flip side, my husband can tolerate it.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Best protein out there
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder!! No bloating like other do to my body! Highly recommend to anyone!! Many benefits to taking this protein
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: WAY too sweet
customer_reviews.text: Love the ingredients and that there are no fillers, but the taste is ridiculously sweet. WAY too much sweetener. The vanilla is almost undrinkable due to the amount of sweetener. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.P

customer_reviews.title: Taste is legit 👏🏻🤘🏻
customer_reviews.text: Just made a protein pudding using Prime Protein powder and this stuff is hella yummy. I’ve tried a lot of different protein powders and this brand is no my favorite of all time.
customer_reviews.author: ET859

customer_reviews.title: Taste great & limited ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My fave protein powder. I mix it with my oatmeal and some strawberries for easiest breakfast on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: Jynfin

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet. Tastes bad.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like it, but WAY to sweet. Too bad, seemed like a great product, but sadly will go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: comes out perfect frothy chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a grass fed protein that doesn’t make me gag!! This is it :) You have to blend it and serve very cold. I blend it with about 12 oz of water and a couple ice cubes.....comes out perfect frothy chocolate. Officially off the pea protein and switched to prime protein.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like vanilla cake mix....yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I've been using whey protein and recently had this recommended to me. Which after a WOD my friend gave me a sip of her's and I was instantly hooked. I want to try their new products, especially the greens bc I'm sure it's just as yummy. Benefit of the vanilla smells like cake mix.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Arhakos

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Has great flavor. Chocolate is like eating a brownie and the vanilla really does taste like cake batter. 4 stars because of the clumpiness. It does decrease if put in a blender but really need to shake it in a shaker. Will I purchase again? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

product_meta.title: Beef Paleo Protein Powder: Keto Collagen Low Carb Ketogenic Diet Supplement Vital for Caveman & Carnivore Nutrition of Ancient Source. Best as Gelatin Muscle Meat Proteins Drink (Chocolate)
feature_bullets: 100% pure grass-fed beef protein: Sourced from 100 non-GMO, hormone and antibiotic free, pasture raised USA grass-fed cattle. 30 servings of protein equivalent nutrition to 4 oz grass-fed beef.

Collagen and gelatin packed: Contains the full amino acid profile of joint and gut support from collagen and gelatin that you'd expect from grass-fed beef. This protein is about 70% muscle meat and 30% collagen and gelatin just like a real cow. A workout protein supplement that supports leaky gut. If you like bone broth protein powders you will notice similarities between bovine protein and bonebroth.

Clean protein, no additives: You'll never find any dairy, gluten, artificial colors, artificial flavors, binding agents, preservatives, flow agents, or anything else that doesn't add to your health in our products.

Paleo approved: The only paleo protein powder and paleo approved protein on the market. No weird stuff. Check our ingredient label for proof! Milk & lactose free. A great muscle building alternative high protein source to whey, soy, chicken, or egg protein which makes it safe for those with allergies to those foods.

Delicious taste: Clean protein from only three ingredients: 100 grass-fed beef isolate protein, rich cocoa powder, and stevia leaf powder. No it doesn't taste like beef! It tastes like amazingly fudgey brownies.
